title: deprecate onlineCheckMethod and change log level to console.info
body: * Automating the isOnline test to deprecate the need of onlineCheckMethod. * If the onlineCheckMethod is detected in the config file, you will get this warning on starting the app. * Changing the default log level to console.info instead of using the electron-log defaults. Might help with https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/issues/1405, https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/issues/1381
